executive_summary.scope: Comprehensive Stand Up Sydney Backend Infrastructure Analysis

critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.description: Profiles table exists but contains no data despite authentication trigger
critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.business_impact: Users cannot access platform features, profile uploads fail

critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.issue: API Keys Exposed in Configuration Files
critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.description: Multiple API keys for GitHub, Slack, AI services exposed in plain text
critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.business_impact: Unauthorized access to external services, potential data breach

critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.description: Vite development server running in production environment
Field names don't match between frontend expectations and database reality
critical_issues_requiring_immediate_atte.business_impact: Event creation fails, applications system broken

system_strengths: Well-structured webhook handling with security validation
Extensive MCP integration with 15 external services
Sophisticated invoice and payment processing system
Good separation of concerns in service architecture
Robust ticket sales integration with Humanitix
areas_of_concern: Zero data in core database tables despite system being 'operational'
Broken foreign key relationships preventing proper data joins
Multiple missing database tables referenced in code
Single point of failure with single server deployment
No backup or disaster recovery procedures documented

major_vulnerabilities: API credentials exposed in configuration files
No rate limiting on API endpoints

scenarios.impact: Platform unusable for new users, existing users lose access to features
Unauthorized access to GitHub repos, Slack workspace, AI services billing
Complete platform downtime, no failover mechanism

actions: Investigate and fix profile system data population
Move all API keys to environment variables
Fix database schema mismatches for events table

executive_summary.conclusion: The Stand Up Sydney backend infrastructure demonstrates sophisticated architectural planning with comprehensive features, but suffers from critical operational and security gaps that pose immediate risks to business continuity and data security. The system requires urgent attention to core data integrity issues and security vulnerabilities before it can be considered production-ready.
